_description: A glorious garland of eight roses, at end of Latin text of Rolle’s De modo vivendi — four couplets

BLHar5398.First Lines:
Goddys chosyn who so wil beAnd euer wony on his
                    blis…
BLHar5398.Last Lines:
…Thynk on þy deth drede paynes depeAske mercy haue blis a
                    boue
